episodes.title: KULTTALK   Podcast #3 Alexandra Stein (EnOV): It’s not just a quirky little cult thing
episodes.description:
- Here the original language Version for the English audience - 
The „CULTTALK“ – A German Podcast about experiences in Cults and Destructive Groups. A talk with ex-cult-members and Experts. 
Also available on spotify: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/dashboard/episode/e24s7o0

In this podcast episode, we listen to the English-American cult expert Dr. Alexandra Stein. We talk about the core of her work: the connection of cults to the attachment theory. How did she come up with this? What are the connections to disorganized attachment, isolation and dissociation? This also includes our own experiences, such as from her or my cult history. 
We learn a lot here about the social meaning of "cult enlightenment"; what the whole thing has to do with our society life and destructive political currents like dictatorships.
Enjoy listening!
